title: (x) Font of the coat of arms - handlettered
content:
I want the font name of this text. this is orignallly from the coat of arm. Here is the link of that coat of arms

http://www.telegraph.co.uk/telegraph/multimedia/archive/01488/b1\_1488408a.jpg

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202031042im_/http:/typophile.com/files/105853-LOST%20LOINERS%20TAG%20RLFC_5832.jpg)
author: artslons

comments.content:
Seriously?  
The lettering in coats of arms usually is not made with fonts. That said, this looks [uncialish](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202031042/http:/new.myfonts.com/tags/uncial/)/ [lombardic](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202031042/http:/new.myfonts.com/tags/lombardic/).  
F
